interpretation.pi: Very high narrativity - narrative determines cultural survival even in sacred text
interpretation.theta: Very low awareness - selection process invisible, nobody questions why some stories persist
interpretation.lambda: Very low constraints - free access, massive distribution, active transmission
interpretation.nominative_gravity: Very high - stories that become idioms achieve cultural immortality
interpretation.narrative_agency: Very high - narrative has major impact on survival independent of theological weight

key_findings: All stories have equal claimed divine authority, yet persistence varies 2%-99%
Narrative genomic features (underdog, villain, visual, metaphor) predict survival
Theological importance does not predict cultural persistence
Narrative selection process is completely unconscious
Idiom formation (nominative compression) predicts cultural immortality
Even maximum authority (sacred text) cannot overcome poor narrative structure
